titles.title: A bill to restore income averaging for farmers.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow qualified farmers to use income averaging. Defines "qualified farmer" as a person who: (1) is actively engaged in the trade or business of farming; and (2) has 50 percent or more of income for the three preceding taxable years which is attributable to such trade or business.
